fields.summary: iOS: info/warn level "unhandled action FBSSceneSnapshotAction" when locking iOS 9 device

comments.body: Still happening in the iOS9 + Xcode 7 GA, but it is still an Apple bug as discussed in Stackoverflow and the Apple dev community board.
Closing ticket as the issue is not our bug.
